page.title: 16Law and Order
page.content: Really the area is quite a peaceful place in which to live. The problem that concerns the local population is the fact that no policeman now lives in the area surveyed. In an emergency one can dial 999, but this is not the same as having a local Bobby that one can call on. There is some vandalism to bus shelters and windows and many people claim this is more because there are not so many policemen. Occassional breakins and burglaries to houses, shops and car repair units have occurred but it is not known if they get caught. Once a policeman would tour the schools to talk to the children but this does not happen now. Many of the older inhabitants would like to see the police stop the young teenagers from being so noisey in the streets during the evenings.
